au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: MT_19280_apx10_020810
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(19280,0) # Drive guide to MT config driveGuide(guideConfig.mt) #set sample ap to 10 mm #sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive entrance aperture to 150 (for ga) driveEntRotAp(150) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(38, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(210)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(38, 0) driveBsz(251.0)
